title: Redwood National and State Parks: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park                   Redwoods, Tiger Lilies, and Bears               History and Culture         Â   Want to learn more? Follow the links below:NewsAccess press releases, browse through the archive, and subscribe to updates for all the latest information.Photos and MoreLearn about the park's resources through videos, photos, and more.History and Culture Discover the living record of the past in the park's cultural landscapes.Science and ResearchFind out how plate tectonics has shaped this park. Learn how scientists have used bulldozers to revive a watershed. Find out what animals call the waters and forests of Redwood National and State Parks home.EducationRedwood National and State Parks are home to two outdoor schools, offering both day and overnight, standards-based programs. Near or far, the park can be your classroom with virtual tours!Behind the ScenesLearn what goes into running a National Park, find information about policies and regulations, and discover how your tax dollars are used. Kids and YouthBecome a Junior Ranger or go on a Redwood EdVenture Quest!
